title: Cold water: the silent killer
creator_credit: Joan Goldi, John Goldi and Goldi Productions
brief_description: Part of the Outdoor Safety series, this film illustrates practices for both the prevention and treatment of hypothermia. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
